main.name: Naomi Torres
main.description: I am a Team Lead at Lambda School for part time Web students
main.bio: I am a Full Stack Web Dev student at Lambda School during the week, and I decorate beautiful cakes on the weekend.

education.description: Learned in depth many frameworks for both frontend and backend

work.title: Team Lead
work.description: Provided one on one support with up to 20 students during the week. Graded each individual student's code project and provided feedback. Submitted attendance daily.

work.title: Cake Decorator
work.description: Consulted with customers and provided beautifully detailed cakes.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
